title: How to change color of Home Panel from black to white in some socials like Instagram or VK?
content: Hello! I have next problem : After update my home panel on Pixel XL begin to color in white when entering some socials like Instagram or VK (for example, like when you go into Google Photos or in Options) and it was very beautiful and stylish for me. Now,after another small update, home panel stays black like it was before the first update. Here is the deal : maybe anybody knows how can I make it white again ??? Please help solve it ,thank you.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
